archives.noResults: No archives found for these criteria

collections.noSearchResults: No collection found for this search

externalLink.title: External link
externalLink.description: You will be redirected to an external site to listen to "{{title}}". Do you want to continue?

player.watchTitle: Watch {{title}} ({{year}}) on {{channel}}. Discover this archive on +2Télé.

zapping.title: Zapping TV
zapping.description: Rediscover television archives in a random way
zapping.explore: Explore television archives in a random way. Like a real zapping!

comments.title: Comments

guidelines.notice: Your comments must respect our community charter.

comments.deleteDescription: This action is irreversible. The comment will be permanently deleted.

footer.description: Rediscover the treasures of television through our collection of archives.

wiki.title: +2Wiki
wiki.description: Explore our collaborative knowledge base on the history of French television.

mastodon.title: Mastodon
mastodon.description: Follow our news and interact with the community on our Mastodon instance.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Join our Discord community to discuss and share your memories.

cookies.description: We use a self-hosted instance of Matomo Analytics to improve your experience. This data is hosted in France and is never shared with third parties. It will only be used for statistical purposes and to improve the platform.

auth.description: Log in or create an account to participate in the community.

profile.title: My profile
profile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.

form.mottoPlaceholder: Share a quote that represents you...
form.pronounsInvalidFormat: Invalid format. Use the Pronoun/Pronoun format (e.g. He/Him).
form.discordNotificationsHelp: Receive private messages for important notifications.

account.title: Account
account.deleteConfirmDescription: This action is irreversible. All your data will be deleted.

upload.title: Title
upload.missingFields: Please fill all mandatory fields (Archive Type and Channel) for all files.
upload.videoHelp: Only MP4 files. Respect the resolution.
upload.uploadingDescription: Please wait while your archive is being uploaded...

community.title: Community charter
community.description: Rules and guidelines for a respectful community
community.intro: To maintain a welcoming and constructive environment, we have established rules that all members must respect during their interactions on +2Télé.

respect.title: Mutual respect
respect.description: Treat others with respect. Insults, harassment, discriminatory or offensive comments are not tolerated.

ontopic.title: Comment relevance
ontopic.description: Comments must be related to the archive or current discussion. Avoid off-topic comments.

spam.title: No spam
spam.description: Repetitive messages, unsolicited advertising, and malicious links are prohibited.

moderation.title: Moderation
moderation.description: Our moderation team ensures that these rules are respected to maintain a healthy environment.
moderation.warning: Comments that do not respect these rules will be deleted without notice.

sanctions.title: Sanctions
sanctions.description: In case of non-compliance with the rules, sanctions may be applied:
